name: Necromantic Legion - Game Jam Version
description: Necromantic Legion is a game where you play as a necromancer who is bringing armageddon to the world by killing all of the living people. It is an action game where the goal is to survive for as long as possible. This is simply a prototype game and did not end up as polished as I would have liked...perhaps in the future I will consider continuing development of this game into a proper wave survival game with more features. The game is developed using Unreal Engine 4. Unfortunately, I was unable to build a Mac version of the game. Nonetheless, I hope you enjoy this demo game!
